title: zpizza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Italian, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pizza chain that offers vegan cheese, Gardein meat crumbles, and a berkeley vegan pizza. Also, the california, casablanca, greek, napoli, provence, and tuscan pizza can be made vegan if ordered without cheese. The california salad is vegan, and the arugula, greek, and pear and gorgonzola pizzas can be made vegan if ordered without cheese. The mediterranean plate is vegan if ordered without feta.
